description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Mathematics and Science. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Open to undergraduate students Completed 45 hours Enrolled full-time Minimum 3.5 GPA Must have a declared intent to study in the field of Dentistry Participation in student pre-dental group on campus or participated in community service geared towards dental needs Two faculty recommendations Selection Requirements Priority Consideration will be given to students who have or are currently shadowing a dental professional, The recipient must not be the Donor or an immediate family member of the Donor.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
